meanings.sent1: She hostessed the party by greeting guests and making sure everyone felt welcome.
meanings.sent2: She always hostessed events with grace and charm.
meanings.sent3: The cat hostessed the gathering of birds in the garden, pretending to be the elegant hostess.
meanings.sent4: The sun hostessed the sky, shining brightly and warming the earth below.
meanings.sent5: Her smile hostessed the room, lighting up the faces of all who saw her.

meanings.sent1: After the event, she became the hostessed of the evening, remembered for her hospitality.
meanings.sent2: The hostessed of the party greeted everyone with a warm smile.
meanings.sent3: The hostessed of the group, she led the way with grace and poise.
meanings.sent4: She was the hostessed of the gathering, ensuring everyone had a great time.
meanings.sent5: As the hostessed, she made sure every detail was perfect for her guests.
